channel.title: Release Near-dragscape + tut portfoward+ip in clients tut**
channel.description:
[size=24pt]near-dragscape[/size] [size=14pt]*added barrows *added bandos(droprate must be edited) *new home *lots of NEW commands added *fixed corporeal & tormented demons *whe have dice ::dice *a rare pvp zone :) *king black dragon, only singel attack *added dice zone *fixed slayer tower ncpc attack
*i took hybrid pvp as base.**littel thanks to him*[/size]
Some Pics __________________________________________________________________________________________________________ kbd with altars [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/kbdwithaltars.png[/img]
portal to dice zone [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/enterdicezone.png[/img]
dice zone [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/indicezone.png[/img]
How to dice:) [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/dice-1.png[/img]
NEW HOME [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/home.png[/img]
costum pk zone portal [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/costumpkzoneenter-1.png[/img]
in costum pk zone [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/enteredcostumpk.png[/img]
barrows 100% added [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/dice.png[/img]
cache dl 100% work [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/cache.png[/img]
bandos *drop all godwar items* in edit [IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/bandos.png[/img]
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ A littel tutorial what u need? a brain java a server and source+client (like mine) ____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ IF you want to know something about ip in this server
gui.java
UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName()); sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("0.0.0.0")); initUI(); } catch(Exception ex) { ex.printStackTrace(); } make 1 with 127.0.0.1 so you can play local host(the client u use to play)
make a copy of client and do this open cmd.exe type ipconfig and set ur default gateway into gui.java __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ next
all .no-ip needs to be added into in client.java
make a .no-ip at www.no-ip.org download and turn it on at your pc*note* put .no-ip duc always on ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
change log in message [Announcements] announcement1=Forums: www.near-dragscape.webs.com announcement2=Only Donate to Owner Danny or Owner Kevin announcement3=added bandos boss(it drop all godwars items announcement4=added barrows 100% *above floor, no spade needed
at \near-dragscape Source than at Announcements
change teleports at clickbuttons.java also quest tab *i am not sure any more didnt play for 3 weeks :) ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ its still downloading original cache change cache at cachedownloader
PORTFORWARD
[IMG]http://i1201.photobucket.com/albums/bb352/dannymuis/portforward.png[/img] its should look like this alwas portforward at port 43594 or 5555 IN THIS CASE ONLY PORT 43594 server is set on that port __________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ here is the download link [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/87723855/Near-dragscapee.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/87723855/Near-dragscapee.rar[/url]download client+source package [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/87723855/ErasedPkzcache1.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/87723855/ErasedPkzcache1.zip[/url]cache *costum*
JarMaker[url=http://goldenstudios.or.id/products/utilities/jarmaker/]http://goldenstudios.or.id/products/utilities/jarmaker/[/url] Java Jdk[url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html[/url]
this is it for now , hope helped lost of pple and succes!!!!
if link is broken pm me on skype danny.overesch
if your hate or say leech dont leaf a command behind because i dont have any thing about that enjoy and leech.

item.title: Release Near-dragscape + tut portfoward+ip in clients tut**
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:18, topic:450266”]Is there some sort of requirement to be a complete tosser when commenting on other peoples work in this section? Perhaps the above members could direct me to a sticky where such a rule is stated. How on Earth is the OP going to learn if all you’re doing is taking systematic digs at him one after the other.

Instead of just stating how bad it is, and being a complete jackass why don’t you all take the time to post what is wrong with it in your view, and how you feel he should go about fixing it and perhaps direct the OP towards content that could help him in the progression of this server in the future.

I haven’t done any RSPS development in a while now but I’ll go ahead and give my personal suggestions to the OP,

[ol][li]First of all, it’s usually a good idea to crop images and format your topic a little better, while this isn’t server development it makes it easier for people on the forums to understand your server, and get an idea of the features you offer. If you don’t know how to crop images then check this link out for a guide.[/li]
[li]You should look into creating some unique content, perhaps a minigame or something? Generally people get bored of the same old thing when it comes to RSPS.[/li]
[li]You should ensure the content you add comes with little flaws, for example, your dice system could be abused as they could just type that out themselves. While staff members couldn’t as there crown vanishes when they use the function normal members could as they have no icon next to their name. I’m sure there are other issues as well, that’s just one I quickly picked up from one of the images.[/li][/ol]

Just some food for thought. If you need any help feel free to PM me.

[size=1pt]not constuctive ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D[/size][/quote]

You are truely a idiot, you de repp me, but heres the thing, i did say what was wrong with it, so why dont you put some glasses on and re read what i said; i said there is altars/Bandos boss @ kbd’s lair when they should be in the Gwd, i’m pretty sure that i said the most thats wrong with it than anyone else here including yourself. so why dont you get your head out of your moms ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Release Near-dragscape + tut portfoward+ip in clients tut**
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Is there some sort of requirement to be a complete tosser when commenting on other peoples work in this section? Perhaps the above members could direct me to a sticky where such a rule is stated. How on Earth is the OP going to learn if all you’re doing is taking systematic digs at him one after the other.

Instead of just stating how bad it is, and being a complete jackass why don’t you all take the time to post what is wrong with it in your view, and how you feel he should go about fixing it and perhaps direct the OP towards content that could help him in the progression of this server in the future.

I haven’t done any RSPS development in a while now but I’ll go ahead and give my personal suggestions to the OP,

[ol][li]First of all, it’s usually a good idea to crop images and format your topic a little better, while this isn’t server development it makes it easier for people on the forums to understand your server, and get an idea of the features you offer. If you don’t know how to crop images then check this link out for a guide.[/li]
[li]You should look into creating some unique content, perhaps a minigame or something? Generally people get bored of the same old thing when it comes to RSPS.[/li]
[li]You should ensure the content you add comes with little flaws, for example, your dice system could be abused as they could just type that out themselves. While staff members couldn’t as there crown vanishes when they use the function normal members could as they have no icon next to their name. I’m sure there are other issues as well, that’s just one I quickly picked up from one of the images.[/li][/ol]

Just some food for thought. If you need any help feel free to PM me.

[size=1pt]not constuctive ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Release Near-dragscape + tut portfoward+ip in clients tut**
item.dc:creator: @dannymoparscape dannymoparscape
item.description:
@dannymoparscape wrote:

[size=24pt]near-dragscape[/size]
[size=14pt]*added barrows
*added bandos(droprate must be edited)
*new home
*lots of NEW commands added
*fixed corporeal & tormented demons
*whe have dice ::dice
*a rare pvp zone
*king black dragon, only singel attack
*added dice zone
*fixed slayer tower ncpc attack

*i took hybrid pvp as base.*littel thanks to him[/size]

Some Pics

kbd with altars

portal to dice zone

dice zone

How to dice:)

NEW HOME

costum pk zone portal

in costum pk zone

barrows 100% added

cache dl 100% work

bandos drop all godwar items in edit

A littel tutorial
what u need?
a brain
java
a server and source+client (like mine)

IF you want to know something about ip in this server

gui.java

		UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName());
		sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("0.0.0.0"));
		initUI();
	} catch(Exception ex)	{
		ex.printStackTrace();
	}

make 1 with 127.0.0.1 so you can play
local host(the client u use to play)

make a copy of client and do this
open cmd.exe type ipconfig and set ur default gateway into gui.java

next

all .no-ip needs to be added into in client.java

make a .no-ip at www.no-ip.org
download and turn it on at your pcnote put .no-ip duc always on

change log in message
[Announcements]
announcement1=Forums: www.near-dragscape.webs.com
announcement2=Only Donate to Owner Danny or Owner Kevin
announcement3=added bandos boss(it drop all godwars items
announcement4=added barrows 100% *above floor, no spade needed

at \near-dragscape Source than at Announcements

change teleports at clickbuttons.java also quest tab *i am not sure any more didnt play for 3 weeks

its still downloading original cache
change cache at cachedownloader

PORTFORWARD


its should look like this
alwas portforward at port 43594 or 5555
IN THIS CASE ONLY PORT 43594 server is set on that port

here is the download link
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/87723855/Near-dragscapee.rardownload client+source package
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/87723855/ErasedPkzcache1.zipcache costum

JarMakerhttp://goldenstudios.or.id/products/utilities/jarmaker/
Java Jdkhttp://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html

this is it for now , hope helped lost of pple and succes!!!

if link is broken pm me on skype
danny.overesch

if your hate or say leech dont leaf a command behind because i dont have any thing about that
enjoy and leech.

Read full topic
